item.description:
Working Lunch: We will be meeting for an early lunch (so we beat the traffic) at the Burlington Panera Bread in the back room.

As this is our first meetup, we will be going through introductions and then listing subjects of interest. We will prioritize topics and get an idea of meeting times/days that work for most people.

If you are interested in helping to shape our agenda, this is the chance.

This meeting will focus on the following three points:


  • Introduction of each attendee and 2-3 minute bio about what they do and what they want to achieve
  • Assembling a prioritized list of those subjects that are of most interest to you for discussion/research
  • Networking with other Small Business Owners (bring your business cards and brochures!)



If time permits, we will also tackle a few of the items on the list immediately by tapping our current knowledge base... so bring a notebook.

Note that the cost of food is not included in the meetup fee (yet). However, I will be refunding $5 of the $10 fee to those who attend.

Pre-payment is required so that I have an exact headcount. Repeat Yes rsvps that do not provide payment will be removed from the meetup group - so please make sure your rsvp is accurate.

You can pay through Pay Pal or by calling Guard Up Family Swordsmanship at (781) 270-4800 and providing your Credit Card information. Your credit card will be charged $10 and your payment status will be changed to "Paid". Or, you can stop off at our facility (conveniently located near the Burlington Mall) and pay with cash or check:

Guard Up! Family Swordsmanship
141 Middlesex Turnpike
Burlington, MA 01803

If this sounds serious, it's because it is. None of us have time to waste on a meetup that doesn't create results. So look at your schedule and find the time to make your business grow.
item.how_to_find_us: Meghan: Tall blond wearing a red Sweatshirt and sitting in the back room.
item.name: Location for Serious Small Business Owners April Meetup
